item.description: About Matheus Alcantara Software Developer at Gympass mths.cc@pm.me Detailed CV

Experience Jun 2022/Present - Software Enginner, Gympass Backend development using Go in a distributed system architecture. May 2021/Jun 2022 - Backend Software Enginner, Zup Innovation Maintainer of Horusec; open source security command line tool. Development of a semantic analysis engine that uses compiler techniques such as SSA and Data Flow Analysis to improve the accuracy of static code analysis. Jul 2020/May 2021 - Software Enginner, Konker Backend development of a SAST (Static Application Security Testing) tool using Go, PostgreSQL and RabbitMQ.
